reporting-org.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs

title.narrative: Provision of Life-saving humanitarian SNFI , CCCM ,and WASH assistance for the most vulnerable new IDPs in North of Syria

description.narrative: Takaful with Nasaem organization through this project will work in expanding and establishing new camps in the targeted locations with other WASH and NFIs services to raise the capacity absorb more of IDPs, which are keep coming because of the military actions in their villages and cities, to improve their life conditions and help them to cope with harsh displacement and winter Intervention will take place in a Aleppo and Idleb in 9 locations in Dana, Maret Tmasrin, Aghtrin and Atareb with total 1730 HHs 8650 individuals (1903 men , 2076 women, 2249 boys , 2422 girl) Takaful with IP obtained the HLP documents before starting the project, and then put the blueprints for the camp to include the lands designated for tents, in addition to the rest of other facilities that must be available according to CCCM criteria The project will start in meetings with the local actors in each targeted location to explain the project and its goals Takaful with IP already select the proper lands and divided it according to the needed elements, which will be establish on it -The intervention will be through installation of tents with graveling as follows: We will receive the tents from contingency stock and will store them well until the time of installation Then we will announce the tender to submit the contractor for the implementation of the ground insulation, After the tents are ready, the team will deliver them to beneficiaries. we will appoint two engineers to supervise the entire process of graveling and tents installation to ensure that it’s in line with the Cluster. After delivering tents to the beneficiaries Takaful’s with IP will distribute NFI kits to the same benes, so they can habitant the tent properly WASH services will be as follow: -water trucking 30 liter per person per day for 6 months -Installation of 260 (1000-liter tank) for all camps with quality test quality test -installation of 73 latrines blocks in the camps, with special arrangements for PWD such as ramps. Iron bars in addition to gender dis-aggregation -Garbage deportation and Hygiene promotion awareness sessions -Each WASH activity will target : Batbu 2400 Bens–Dana2329 –Hezreh201-Kelly1920-Turkman Bareh1800, Beneficiaries will be among vulnerable new IDPs of both genders, with a priority to selecting the most vulnerable: women, children headed HH, PwD, sick, PLW and elderly Takaful will be sure to include the targeted IDPs in this project in other services by targeting them with the other project the organization in many fields such as FSL, Education and protection We already designed the site planning charts according to cluster specifications(attached) -The available spaces are enough for expanding and establishing the targeted locations according to cluster guidelines (each site available space in attach) We will also gravel the internal roads between camps where all the process will be supervised by engineers -We will provide training for the camp management committee to continue managing the camps after the end of project We will ensure that the principle of Do No Harm is applied in all project's activities through exit surveys -Takaful will coordinate with CCCM\SNFI and WASH cluster and with other actors who works in the field to reach the right beneficiaries and avoid duplication Project staff will include female and male trained on the protection principles and gender equality -Takaful will monitor the implementation through our monitoring system by applying onsite monitoring -Intervention with Nasaem is very vital as the IP have full access to their locations with capacity to implement CCCM and Shelter activities there according to site planning charts Takaful Camps : Wadi Heoun Camps in Hezreh 40HHs-Alfarhan 80HHs and Muzun 16HHs Camps in Kelly – new camp in Kelly 160 HHs – New camp in Batbu 480HHs-Turkman Bareh360HHs Nasaem Camps: Ahali Kansafra Camp in Dana 466HHs- Al Sultan 61 HHs and Kafer Owaid 67HHs Camps in Kelly.
